quotes.quote: Anyone who has lost track of time when using a computer knows the propensity to dream, the urge to make dreams come true and the tendency to miss lunch.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right, for you’ll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Better to write for yourself and have no public, than to write for the public and have no self.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: We must not allow other people’s limited perceptions to define us.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Computers themselves, and software yet to be developed, will revolutionize the way we learn.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Reading computer manuals without the hardware is as frustrating as reading sex manuals without the software.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.
quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

quotes.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person. They're done by a team of people.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: The good news about computers is that they do what you tell them to do. The bad news is that they do what you tell them to do.
quotes.author: Ted Nelson

quotes.quote: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: It has become appallingly obvious that our technology has exceeded our humanity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The real problem is not whether machines think but whether men do.
quotes.author: B. F. Skinner

quotes.quote: The Linux philosophy is 'Laugh in the face of danger'. Oops. Wrong One. 'Do it yourself'. Yes, that's it.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: I'd much rather have 15 people arguing about something than 15 people splitting into two camps, each side convinced it's right and not talking to the other.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
quotes.author: Tenzin Gyatso

quotes.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The technology keeps moving forward, which makes it easier for the artists to tell their stories and paint the pictures they want.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until its done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Relying on the government to protect your privacy is like asking a peeping tom to install your window blinds.
quotes.author: John Perry Barlow

quotes.quote: The Web as I envisaged it, we have not seen it yet. The future is still so much bigger than the past.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy
